    • Method Detail

      • createDto

        protected WebCmsPublication createDto(WebCmsDataEntry data,
                                      WebCmsPublication itemToUpdate,
                                      WebCmsDataAction action,
                                      Map<String,Object> dataValues)
        Description copied from class: AbstractWebCmsDataImporter
        Create a DTO object for either a new instance or an existing instance. If the existing parameter is null a new instance should be created.

        Note that the DTO should not apply the data entry values yet, but the data entry can be used to determine the initial type of instance that needs to be created.

        If the DTO is null, the import will be skipped but properties will still be called.

        Specified by:
        createDto in class AbstractWebCmsDataImporter<WebCmsPublication,WebCmsPublication>
        Parameters:
        data - entry
        itemToUpdate - instance or null if a new instance should be created
        action - purpose for which the DTO should be created (create, delete or replace)
        dataValues - modifiable collection of the data values that will be applied afterwards
        Returns:
        DTO

      • prepareForSaving

        protected WebCmsPublication prepareForSaving(WebCmsPublication itemToBeSaved,
                                             WebCmsDataEntry data)
        Description copied from class: AbstractWebCmsDataImporter
        Override if you want to post process an item before saving. Useful if you want to generate property values for example.
        Overrides:
        prepareForSaving in class AbstractWebCmsDataImporter<WebCmsPublication,WebCmsPublication>
        Parameters:
        itemToBeSaved - original item to be saved
        data - that was used to build the item
        Returns:
        new item to be saved instead - null if saving should be skipped

      • getExistingEntity

        protected WebCmsPublication getExistingEntity(String entryKey,
                                              WebCmsDataEntry data,
                                              WebCmsDomain domain)
        Description copied from class: AbstractWebCmsAssetImporter
        If no asset has been found by the unique asset key and domain combination (or no asset key was defined), this method will be called with the entry key.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        entryKey - for the asset
        data - for he asset
        domain - for the asset
        Returns:

      • validate

                        org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
        Description copied from class: AbstractWebCmsDataImporter
